thread.section_title: Vision Direct Australia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Vision Direct Australia | www.visiondirect.com.au | 2 of 258
thread.title: Customer
thread.title_full: Vision Direct Australia reviewed by Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text:
I bought two pairs of glasses through Vision Direct and had to return one. The process was very easy.
Things I enjoyed about this experience: the website is relatively easy to use, checkout was fast, the glasses came with all the trimmings. The return process was easy and I had a refund in my account before a week.
Things that would deter me in the future: extremely long processing times - it took 3 weeks before the glasses were ready and shipped to me. Not much choice on lense coatings - i find the anti-glare not up to snuff, and I would have liked an option for better protection. I had to pay for shipping to have glasses returned and then processing fees were applied (of which I was not made aware) to my refund.
Overall I've had worse online shopping experiences and I've had better. I don't know if I would purchase again given the issues stated above. The prices are genuinely lower than other sites, so that would probably remain a decisive factor.
